scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test && sequelize db:drop || true && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate &&  jest  ./src/tests --forceExit
scripts.test:coverage: export NODE_ENV=test && sequelize db:drop || true && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate &&  jest  ./src/tests --forceExit --coverage && codecov -t a3a183a9-02b0-4328-9f31-6fa485bb7adf
scripts.test:watch: export NODE_ENV=test && sequelize db:drop || true && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate &&  jest  ./src/tests --forceExit --coverage --watch
